description: Detects the registration of a new ODBC driver where the driver is located in a potentially suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potentially Suspicious ODBC Driver Registered
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\ODBC\\ODBCINST.INI\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Driver OR *\\Setup) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*\:\\PerfLogs\\* OR *\:\\ProgramData\\* OR *\:\\Temp\\* OR *\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\Registration\\CRMLog* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\com\\dmp\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\FxsTmp\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\Microsoft\\Crypto\\RSA\\MachineKeys\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\PRINTERS\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\SERVERS\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks_Migrated\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\com\\dmp\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\FxsTmp\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PLA\\System\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\Tracing\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\*))
